remarks: Closure of the negative of a functional.  (This is specialized for the purpose of proving ~ ldualgrp , and we do not define a general operation here.)  (Contributed by NM, 22-Oct-2014.)
statement:
lflnegcl.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lflnegcl.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lflnegcl.i $e |- I = ( invg ` R ) $.
lflnegcl.n $e |- N = ( x e. V |-> ( I ` ( G ` x ) ) ) $.
lflnegcl.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
lflnegcl.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
lflnegcl.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
lflnegcl $p |- ( ph -> N e. F ) $.
$d G x $.
$d I x $.
$d R x $.
$d V x $.
$d W x $.
$d ph x $.
